p: To investigate the anti-atherogenic effects of HDE in the aorta, we isolated whole aortas of the ApoE −/− mice and detected aortic atherosclerotic lesions stained with Oil Red O. Supplementation with HDE (15.3%) reduced atherosclerotic plaque burden by about 10% in the total aortas compared with HCD-fed control group (26.9%) ( Fig. 4C). The relative lesions of the aortic sinus were reduced by approximately 1.5-fold in HDE-injected mice compared to vehicle ( Fig. 4D).
